title: Michael Bolton - Love Songs (2001) 320k +bonus (musicfromrizzo)
description:
Here is some truly great music from Michael Bolton with human feeling and warmth
clearly showing as an example to all the folks here.

This is is hard to find it seems, Love Songs CD (2001) with some carefully added tracks so that you don't really miss out by not taking the Ballads CD and Ultimate collection if you don't really want any of the songs we haven't already brought you here on this download as a bonus track (musicfromrizzo)

Some of my most favourite songs are on this torrent including Michael Bolton singing "When a man loves a woman" "A love so beautiful" and "Ain't no sunshine" I'm also getting hooked on his version of "Sexual healing" (orig Marvin
Gaye)

please seed this great music from a great soul indeed singing this great stuff back then for us to enjoy!
 
Michael Rizzo Chessman
(musicfromrizzo)
